Name: Lab Chaos
About the game: Lab Chaos is a fun and challenging indie action platformer game. If you're a casual gamer, a completionist or love to speedrun, Lab Chaos is the game for you. Help our cute little hero Fleck navigate 37 wild levels of a vast and dangerous laboratory. Using Fleck’s unique shape-shifting ability, you’ll encounter an innovative variety of obstacles that will send you flipping, floating and flying through each level toward the exit portal. Each level is hand-crafted with original artwork, sound effects and an original soundtrack that will have your toes tapping.. Game Features: 37 hand-crafted levels, with more to come! Physics-based platforming with unique play style A variety of fun challenges and achievements to earn Partial controller support
